# REQUIREMENT_ANALYSIS PHASE

## Original Project Requirement
## Original Requirement:
TastyTalk is an AI-powered platform that helps people learn to cook in their own mother tongue. By combining regional language understanding, voice interaction, and visual step-by-step guidance, it makes cooking easy, personal, and culturally connected.
